name: Assg7_Alpha_Build_Dhruv_Patel
description:
Dhruv Patel (IT201-006 ) Assignment 7 Alpha Build

This game takes place on the farm, with the enemy on the horse trying to steal the expensive rocks.  The player is collecting the rocks and you have to try not get caught or the enemy will take all your stuff. To play this game simply press left key to go left, right key to go right, up key to go up, down key to go down and last but not list space key to shoot and his the object.
